product_name: ANUAAzelaic Acid 3 Cica Skin Clarifying Toner
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAnua Azelaic Acid 3 Cica Skin Clarifying Toner is a lightweight green toner that calms redness and refines skin texture.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe combination of Azelaic Acid, 7-Cica Complex, and Glycyrrhizic Acid helps soothe sensitive-feeling skin and provides gentle care to visibly irritated areas.Key IngredientsAzelaic Acid 3 % : Helps soothe sensitive blemish concerns and visible redness which gently exfoliates dead skin cells and help to keep pores clear of excess sebum7-Cica Complex : Quickly calms irritation for comfortable skinGlycyrrhizic Acid : Provides targeted care and supports a smoother-looking complexionFormulated WithoutEthanol (Ethyl Alcohol, Denatured Alcohol), Parabens, Phenoxyethanol, Silicones, Sulfates.Item 2647357How To UseApply evenly to the skin with your hands.Tested for skin irritation; suitable for daily use, both AM and PM.Tip: Daily Care:Gently pat into the skin using your hands.Special Care:When concerned about texture or pores, gently swipe with a cotton pad, then allow it to absorb.IngredientsWater, Azelaic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hydroxide, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica Root Extract, Xylose, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Propylene Glycol, Salicylic Acid, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Propanediol, PPG-13-Decyltetradeceth-24, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Docosahexaenoic Acid, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Madecassoside, Panthenol, Asiaticoside, Allantoin, Ectoin, Glycyrrhizic Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Succinic Acid, Zinc PCA, Glycolic Acid, Potassium Azeloyl Diglycinate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polygutamic Acid, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid, Totoral, Squalane, Ceramide NP, Disodium EDTA, o-Cymen-5-ol.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to the skin with your hands.Tested for skin irritation; suitable for daily use, both AM and PM.Tip: Daily Care:Gently pat into the skin using your hands.Special Care:When concerned about texture or pores, gently swipe with a cotton pad, then allow it to absorb.
